original_text: A woman who believes in Christ should take care of any widows in her own family. Then the church will not have to do that work. Instead, the church will be able to help those widows who are really alone.
korean_text: 만일 믿는 여자에게 과부 친척이 있거든 자기가 도와 주고 교회가 짐지지 않게 하라 이는 참 과부를 도와 주게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: A woman who believes in Christ
should take care of any widows
Then the church will not have to do that work
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 교회는 그 일을 할 필요가 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Instead, the church will be able to help
sentences.korean_translation: 대신, 교회는 도울 수 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: those widows who are really alone
